title: [Large-Scale] Science Education Innovation Design Through Large-Scale Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific knowledge and university-level learning experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning program combining collaborative learning and self-directed inquiry in a digital device-enabled environment to strengthen scientific problem-solving competencies.

learning_goals: Learners apply collaborative learning design principles (Carpe Diem methodology) to solve three or more science-based tasks.
Learners conduct five or more peer review activities per semester using digital collaboration tools.
Learners achieve 80% or higher proficiency in two or more formative assessments per semester and submit improvement plans reflecting feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
